item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello world!

Here is some code I’m going to write I hope you like what it says:

  def foo(bar)
    derp what foo.
  end

  def bar(foo)
    "hello"
  end

and here is a blockquote

I am being quoted!

And here too!

And this is the end of my article. And this is the end of my article. And this is the end of my article. And now for some math, (oh by the way you can also inline math $2+2_3$):

$$2 + 2_3$$

The end!
